providers.description: Provides public assistance programs, child and adult protective services, foster care, and supportive services to residents of Fauquier County.
providers.eligibility: Residents of Fauquier County who meet program requirements.
providers.name: Fauquier County Department of Social Services

providers.description: Nonprofit organization providing affordable housing support, housing counseling, and rental assistance programs for low- to moderate-income households.
providers.eligibility: Low- to moderate-income residents of Fredericksburg City and the counties of Spotsylvania, Stafford, Caroline, and King George
providers.name: Central Virginia Housing Coalition
providers.notes: Does not directly provide utility bill payment assistance; clients seeking utility help are typically referred to DSS or community action agencies.

providers.address:
219 East Davis Street 
Suite 300 
Culpeper, VA 22701
providers.description: Sam’s Place is a one-stop community outreach hub where individuals and families can access information, assistance, and referrals to a network of partner organizations. Services include help with basic needs such as health resources, transportation support, food access, home repair referrals, and applications for housing financial aid. The center also provides access to vision and hearing aids, clothing and furniture vouchers, and connects people with additional community partners based on individual needs and eligibility criteria.
providers.eligibility: Referrals are made based upon personal needs, available funds, and program criteria.
providers.name: Sam’s Place

providers.description: The mission of Foothills Housing Network is to make homelessness rare, brief, and nonrecurring. We are a partnership of organizations working to achieve this mission in Virginia's Rappahannock-Rapidan region, serving the counties of Culpeper, Fauquier, Madison, Orange, and Rappahannock Counties
providers.eligibility: Individuals and families who are homeless or at risk of homelessness within the service region. Eligibility varies by program and funding source, typically based on income and housing status.
providers.name: Foothills Housing Network
